message.body: Sorry, I guess I let it slip out to Steve that we were going to your lake tomorrow.
Oh that's fine of course he can come! It wasn't supposed to be a big thing ...I told the girls over a month ago that it was a weekend we were going up an
d you happened to ask about my plans a couple weeks ago!

Oh. I had no idea. He seemed salty he didn't hear about it from you guys. I just told him it wasn't really like a 'thing' or anything, it just popped up. I feel stupid. I didn't know what to say or anything. If you'd like to have a girl's weekend tho I don't mind hanging out here or anything. It's really not a big deal or anything at all. I just want my loved peeps to be all good. Sorry, I hope I'm not a burden with that stuff.
Not at all! Don't be stressed its all good, we definitely want you to come! Dan and I have been working so much we didn't think to invite everyone! Steve
will be fine whether he decides to come or not
It's not a girls weekend! I hope you still come
Ok. I'm sure he won't go but I'm sure he'll be fine as well. He had some other pretty sweet plans anyway also so its fine. Sorry to be dummy, ....but I'm stoked to see y'alls!
Ok good! We're excited to see you too!
Still in Philly. Not leaving for a couple hours cuz danielle is still at work. Gonna pick her up at 5 then head straight there.
